title: Suzlon bags 1,166 MW wind energy order from NTPC Green Energy
description: Suzlon has secured India's largest wind energy order of 1,166 MW from NTPC Green Energy Ltd. The project involves installing 370 wind turbine generators in Gujarat. This initiative will significantly contribute to India's renewable energy goals and enhance Gujarat's leadership in the sector.
